Posts.Content: Apr 20, 2009 08:54AM domenique wrote: the same exact thing happened to me.  it was fine the first dose, and the second time I turned 20 shades of red!  I though someone was sitting on my chest, my legs were like rubber.  They gave me Benadryl and plenty of it.  They restarted much slower and I did fine.  The next time I got Benadryl prior, it almost tried to get me again and they pushed more Benadryl and went with a slower drip.  I did fine as long as I got Benadryl along with, and it was delivered slowly.  The steroids made me a mad woman!
Posts.Title: Anyone else allergic to taxotere? peggyc CrystalLocket

Posts.Content: domenique wrote: I finished chemo 3 months prior to a pap.  The chemo stopped my periods, (I am 48 and considered perimenopausal).  So now the pap shows endometrial cells and they want to do a biopsy.  I am hoping it is because my uteris has not shed.  Anybody ever had this happen? Dx 8/18/2008, IDC, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 1/5 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: after chemo/abnormal pap domenique Marple

Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2009 04:57PM domenique wrote: My oncologist ordered the gyn consult because of the pap.  But the fact that yours said the chemo would make it abnormal is helpful.  Makes sense really.  So much has happened to my body, and all has been disrupted because of it.  Thanks.
Posts.Title: after chemo/abnormal pap domenique Marple

Posts.Content: Apr 20, 2009 11:39AM domenique wrote: Your hair will fall out.  I told my oncologist that I thought the chance was 50/50.  He said no, with TC your hair will fall out... exactly 2 weeks after my first tx my head started feeling funny (like when you've had it in a ponytail too long).. and it started when I was rinsing in the shower.  It made my heart sink!  Only because it seemed so strange to have so much hair in my hands.  It took a good month for it all to fall.  I got two haircuts in the process, it was alot of fun and I had an excuse to try something new.  Loved them both, then shaved when it got really sparce.  It was annoying to have hair falling everywhere so I just got tired of it.  It looked better neatly shaved than strangely balding.   So have fun with it!  I found out I like my head!
Posts.Title: Waiting for hair to fall out......Yikes! GTYforeveryoung domenique
